p:
The context for the outreach tasks is given to the students by memos, briefings and/or developed websites. After consideration of the various computational tools that could be developed for battling the Zombie Apocalypse, we focused on three key demonstrations:
Zombie Outbreak – modelling the spread of the disease
Zombie Detector – application of computer vision and machine learning to automatically identify zombies
Zombie Vaccine – once a potential vaccine has been identified and developed, modelling its dosage and distribution
